【胡乃文開講 】中醫師70多歲不老花 分享3招搶救惡視力

05 Nov 2019, 07:22

老花眼已經出現年輕化的趨勢，有的人才30多歲，外表看起來很年輕，眼睛卻出現看不清楚甚至有老花的現象，為什麼會這樣呢？多數人長時間使用電腦或3C產品，下了班一直滑手機或玩線上遊戲，眼睛無法得到充分的休息，導致水晶體開始變硬，彈性變差；近的東西看不清楚，這是眼睛出現老化的現象。
70多歲也不老花的胡乃文中醫師，分享穴位按摩、眼球運動和護眼飲食3招，教你在短時間內搶救視力，預防和改善老花眼。



──轉自《大紀元》

[Hu Naiwen opens a lecture] Chinese medicine practitioners in their 70s are not old flowers. Share 3 strokes to save sight.

05 Nov 2019, 07:22

Presbyopia has become a trend of rejuvenation. Some people are in their 30s, their appearance looks very young, but their eyes are not clear or even presby. Why is this happening? Most people use computers or 3C products for a long time. They have been sliding their mobile phones or playing online games after work. The eyes can't get enough rest, and the crystals begin to harden and the elasticity is worse. The near things can't be seen clearly. This is the aging of the eyes. The phenomenon.
Hu Naiwen, a Chinese medicine practitioner who is not old in his 70s, shares 3 tips for acupressure, eye movement and eye protection. He teaches you to save your vision and prevent and improve presbyopia in a short time.
